Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2011 04:00PM BobbiC wrote: Hi, Sisters:  Here I am also awaiting results--had surgical biopsy on Monday October 10th and waiting for results.  My nerves are shredded because I had bc 5 years ago.  So I am a "repeat offender"--went for my yearly mammo and there was an abnormality--so we did an ultrasound then ultrasound guided needle/wire localization then surgical biopsy.  Now I wait.  I am trying to be calm but it is hard. Love, hugs and blessings to all. Bobbi
Posts.Title: Rollercoaster waiting for surgical biopsy results Babsplus5 momoftwoboys
